running Catalina on a MacBook7,1


I made several contributions to dosdude1's macOS Catalina Patcher.

posts on MacRumors

Links to some of my relevant posts on the MacRumors thread.

non-Metal acceleration

Widely used but highly unstable patches for graphics acceleration on pre-Metal GPUs.
  • Initial post, details
  • First release, update, source code for 10.15.0 DP1
  • Fix for 10.15.0 DP2, update, source code
  • Assertions fix for 10.15.0 DP4
  • OpenGL sub-library fix for 10.15.0 DP6
  • Fix for 10.15.0 DP7
  • The Dock patch saga: embarrassment, redemption
  • Minimalist OpenGL approach
  • PerfPowerServices fix for 10.15.0 DP9
  • Version number fix (and kextcache discussion) for 10.15.1 DP1
  • Notification Center fix for 10.15.1 final
  • Update for 10.15.4 DP1, update to fix Displays prefpane
  • Screen Capture access update for 10.15.4 final

other fixes

  • nVidia ethernet kext copy
  • Writable system volume mount command, LaunchDaemon
  • Improved light mode transparency fix
  • GeForceTesla patch (supersedes IOSurface modifications)
  • VDADecoderChecker discussion
  • Disk Utility launcher to show hidden volumes
  • Alternate method to disable Library Validation, boot.efi patch to force-disable SIP, discussion of both
  • tccplus GUI wrapper script
  • Workaround for blank accessory buttons in Home
  • Workaround for Pencil annotations crashing Pages

miscellaneous/outdated

  • Early IOSurface and IOHIDFamily patches, update, rambling (obsolete)
  • Xcode 11 DP1 code minimap patch (obsolete as of DP2)
  • Siri flames view patch (no longer necessary)
  • Japanese input analysis (superseded by Minh_Ton's fix)
  • Manual update package install method (problematic, superseded by proper OTA fixes)
  • Hack to disable Desktop Tinting on Metal-supported systems
